content: Well, nevermind. This was a PEBKAC. The -Clinker-plugin-lto flag works as expected. I stumbled over the LLVM Metadata interface. Using LLVMMDNodeInContext2 over the deprecated LLVMMDNodeInContext solved this problem. I think I'll open a PR to get rid of LLVMMDNodeInContext completely in the Rust codebase. (I think the code added in #89652 may run into the same problem here, where the LLVMGlobalSetMetadata will fail, because the Metadata value may fail to cast to an MDNode)
flip1995 has marked this topic as resolved.
